name: Senior Seminar in Sex, Gender and the Body
description: An advanced and in-depth examination of selected topics related to health, sexualities, the gendered body, and the representations and constructions of women and gender. The course will be in a seminar format with student participation expected. It is writing intensive and involves a major research project.
prerequisites: WSTA01H3 and [WSTA03H3 or (WSTA02H3)] and WSTB11H3 and [1.0 credit at the C-level from requirement 5 or 6 of the Major program in Women's and Gender Studies]
